name: Ninja space world
description:
Ninja space world. Ninja World is a fun and enjoyable arcade platform game with nice controls, the ability to buy character skins, weapon types and game backgrounds in the store. This game is a great way to kill some time. Simple but addictive gameplay will not let you get bored, no matter where you are.

You control a character, on the way of which there are many enemies, spikes, traps. At the end of each location there is a unique boss with which you will fight. You can kill different enemies and bosses, but beware of obstacles. Try to complete the game to the end. An adventure awaits you that you will love.

In offline mode, you will not be able to watch ads, but even without it, with good skills, you can complete this game.

You will also collect coins that you can spend in the store.

The store contains various unique characters, backgrounds, weapons. You can change the appearance of the character and his environment as you want.

The game requires a good reaction and making quick decisions.

Game Features:

- Works offline;

-15 superbly crafted levels;

- Pleasant and addictive gameplay;

- Lots of random obstacles and enemies that get harder with each level;

- Comfortable management;

- Unique beautiful skins and backgrounds in the store;

The game is constantly improving and soon you will see even more skins, character traits, different levels with new obstacles and monsters.
